resources.string:
Saved items are in the main menu

Search button will open another activity which allows you to search by airport.

After searching, click on the item to add them to the saved list

Author: Peter Best \n Version number: 0.3 \n Instructions: Type in the Search field the term you wish to search for and click the search button. Tapping on a definition will bring up more detailed information and the option to save it to local storage. To view any locally stored definitions, hit the toggle mode button, though this will disable search functionality.

To use this newsfeed app, type your search request and click on the search button to see the results. A list of results will appear bellow the search bar with the titles of related news items. To view more information on a news item, simply click on the item, and you will be redirected to the full article.
